original_text: Listen, Israelites! Be careful to obey God's rules. If you do that, everything will be well for you. You will have many children. You will live in a land where there is plenty of food and drink, enough for everyone. The Lord, the God of your ancestors, promised that this will happen.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 듣고 삼가 그것을 행하라 그리하면 네가 복을 받고 네 조상들의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 허락하심 같이 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅에서 네가 크게 번성하리라

sentences.original_text: Be careful to obey God's rules.
everything will be well for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 것이 잘 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will live in a land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 한 땅에서 살게 될 것이니,

sentences.original_text: where there is plenty of food and drink,
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 먹을 것과 마실 것이 풍족하여

sentences.original_text: The Lord, the God of your ancestors,
